task.title: How to Deliver Your Instrustional Video
task.shortdesc: If you want to continue to create instructional videos and gather an online following, you will need to take steps to deliver your content.

step.cmd: Promote your first instructional video on YouTube and your social media accounts.
Read the feedback given in the YouTube comments of your video.
Listen to your audience, and create the content they request.
Be consisten in making your content.
step.info: Find a day once a week to upload your content, creating a consistent schedule.
